title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI tool to pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, exposing sync/async APIs to chat, generate, and embed with local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers, providing typed wrappers for all Ollama endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, model management, and multi-user workspaces; runs via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builders, streaming, and Android compatibility published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Lightweight Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints for chat, generate, and embeddings in Rails scripts.

title: ollama-cli (community)
summary: Interactive CLI with fuzzy model search, conversation history, and prompt templates built on ollama-python.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC, and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-made Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Redis, and GPU runtime for quick local labs.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal cross-platform desktop GUI built with Tauri and React for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as Generator or Embedder nodes in production retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for vector search and local LLM answers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into channels with slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket Mode to query Ollama models privately in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app with REST endpoints and async views that wraps Ollama for web-based chat and completions.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that streams Ollama responses with session memory and model picker widgets.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript package downloaded 100k+ times monthly; supports Node ≥18 and modern browsers.
